Spotted socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a foldover shaft with an overlocked, frill-trimmed top.
Shorts in washed stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and fake welt back pockets with a button. Detachable, adjustable elastic braces.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in a crêpe weave with notch lapels, a sewn-in wrapover at the top with a concealed press-stud, shoulder pads and long sleeves with concealed press-studs at the cuffs. Detachable tie belt at the waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs with creases. Lined at the top.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh details and lightly padded cups with removable inserts. Wide shoulder straps that cross at the back and a wide elasticated hem. Light support.

Platform ankle boots in imitation leather with lacing at the front and covered heels. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Platform front approx. 3 cm, heel approx. 11.5 cm.

Short, padded jacket in woven fabric with a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front and hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Flap side pockets with a press-stud, a concealed drawstring at the waist, and elastication and a tab and press-stud at the hem. Quilted lining. Polyester filling.

Short, padded jacket in woven fabric with a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front and hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Flap side pockets with a press-stud, a concealed drawstring at the waist, and elastication and a tab and press-stud at the hem. Quilted lining. Polyester filling.
Fully lined, embroidered swimsuit with a high cut at the neckline, tapered waist and wide shoulder straps at the back.

Metal chain necklaces with a trigger clasp. Two of the necklaces have a metal pendant. Length 56 cm, 61 cm and 71 cm.
